manifest.name: design_golden_gate_oligos
manifest.description: Design complementary oligonucleotides with Type IIS restriction enzyme overhangs for Golden Gate assembly based on restriction site analysis of the backbone.

required_parameters.description: Complete backbone sequence
required_parameters.name: backbone_sequence

required_parameters.description: Sequence to be inserted (e.g., sgRNA target sequence)
required_parameters.name: insert_sequence

required_parameters.description: Type IIS restriction enzyme to be used
required_parameters.name: enzyme_name

optional_parameters.description: Whether the backbone is circular
optional_parameters.name: is_circular

manifest.name: design_knockout_sgrna
manifest.description: Design sgRNAs for CRISPR knockout by searching pre-computed sgRNA libraries. Returns optimized guide RNAs for targeting a specific gene.

required_parameters.description: Target gene symbol/name (e.g., "EGFR", "TP53")
required_parameters.name: gene_name

required_parameters.description: Path to the data lake
required_parameters.name: data_lake_path

optional_parameters.description: Target organism species
optional_parameters.name: species

optional_parameters.description: Number of guides to return
optional_parameters.name: num_guides

manifest.name: design_primer
manifest.description: Design a single primer within the given sequence window.

required_parameters.description: Target DNA sequence
required_parameters.name: sequence

required_parameters.description: Starting position for primer search
required_parameters.name: start_pos

optional_parameters.description: Length of the primer to design
optional_parameters.name: primer_length

optional_parameters.description: Minimum GC content
optional_parameters.name: min_gc

optional_parameters.description: Maximum GC content
optional_parameters.name: max_gc

optional_parameters.description: Minimum melting temperature in Â°C
optional_parameters.name: min_tm

optional_parameters.description: Maximum melting temperature in Â°C
optional_parameters.name: max_tm

optional_parameters.description: Size of window to search for primers
optional_parameters.name: search_window

manifest.name: design_verification_primers
manifest.description: Design Sanger sequencing primers to verify a specific region in a plasmid. First tries to use primers from an existing primer pool. If they cannot fully cover the region, designs additional primers as needed.

required_parameters.description: The complete plasmid sequence
required_parameters.name: plasmid_sequence

required_parameters.description: Start and end positions to verify (0-based indexing)
required_parameters.name: target_region

optional_parameters.description: List of existing primers with their sequences and optional names
optional_parameters.name: existing_primers

optional_parameters.description: Whether the plasmid is circular
optional_parameters.name: is_circular

optional_parameters.description: Typical read length for each primer in base pairs
optional_parameters.name: coverage_length

optional_parameters.description: Length of newly designed primers
optional_parameters.name: primer_length

optional_parameters.description: Minimum GC content for new primers
optional_parameters.name: min_gc

optional_parameters.description: Maximum GC content for new primers
optional_parameters.name: max_gc

optional_parameters.description: Minimum melting temperature in Â°C
optional_parameters.name: min_tm

optional_parameters.description: Maximum melting temperature in Â°C
optional_parameters.name: max_tm

manifest.name: digest_sequence
manifest.description: Simulates restriction enzyme digestion of a DNA sequence and returns the resulting fragments with their properties.

required_parameters.description: Input DNA sequence to be digested
required_parameters.name: dna_sequence

required_parameters.description: Names of restriction enzymes to use for digestion
required_parameters.name: enzyme_names

optional_parameters.description: Whether the DNA sequence is circular (True) or linear (False)
optional_parameters.name: is_circular

manifest.name: find_restriction_enzymes
manifest.description: Finds common restriction enzyme sites in a DNA sequence and returns their cut positions.

required_parameters.description: DNA sequence to analyze
required_parameters.name: sequence

optional_parameters.description: Whether the sequence is circular
optional_parameters.name: is_circular

manifest.name: find_restriction_sites
manifest.description: Identifies restriction enzyme sites in a given DNA sequence for specified enzymes.

required_parameters.description: Complete input DNA sequence
required_parameters.name: dna_sequence

required_parameters.description: List of restriction enzyme names to check
required_parameters.name: enzymes

optional_parameters.description: Whether the DNA sequence is circular (True) or linear (False)
optional_parameters.name: is_circular

manifest.name: find_sequence_mutations
manifest.description: Compare query sequence against reference sequence to identify mutations.

required_parameters.description: The sequence being analyzed
required_parameters.name: query_sequence

required_parameters.description: The reference sequence to compare against
required_parameters.name: reference_sequence

optional_parameters.description: The start position of the query sequence
optional_parameters.name: query_start

manifest.name: get_bacterial_transformation_protocol
manifest.description: Return a standard protocol for bacterial transformation.

optional_parameters.description: Selection antibiotic
optional_parameters.name: antibiotic

optional_parameters.description: Whether the sequence contains repetitive elements
optional_parameters.name: is_repetitive

manifest.name: get_gene_coding_sequence
manifest.description: Retrieves the coding sequence(s) of a specified gene from NCBI Entrez.

required_parameters.description: Name of the gene
required_parameters.name: gene_name

required_parameters.description: Name of the organism
required_parameters.name: organism

optional_parameters.description: Email address for NCBI Entrez (recommended)
optional_parameters.name: email

manifest.name: get_golden_gate_assembly_protocol
manifest.description: Return a customized protocol for Golden Gate assembly based on the number of inserts and specific DNA sequences.

required_parameters.description: Type IIS restriction enzyme to be used
required_parameters.name: enzyme_name

required_parameters.description: Length of the destination vector in bp
required_parameters.name: vector_length

optional_parameters.description: Number of inserts to be assembled
optional_parameters.name: num_inserts

optional_parameters.description: Amount of vector to use in ng
optional_parameters.name: vector_amount_ng

optional_parameters.description: List of insert lengths in bp
optional_parameters.name: insert_lengths

optional_parameters.description: Whether this is for library preparation
optional_parameters.name: is_library_prep

manifest.name: get_oligo_annealing_protocol
manifest.description: Return a standard protocol for annealing oligonucleotides without phosphorylation.

manifest.name: get_plasmid_sequence
manifest.description: Unified function to retrieve plasmid sequences from either Addgene or NCBI. If is_addgene is True or identifier is numeric, uses Addgene. Otherwise searches NCBI using the plasmid name.

required_parameters.description: Either an Addgene ID or plasmid name
required_parameters.name: identifier

optional_parameters.description: Force Addgene lookup if True, force NCBI if False. If None, attempts to auto-detect based on identifier format.
optional_parameters.name: is_addgene

manifest.name: golden_gate_assembly
manifest.description: Simulate Golden Gate assembly to predict final construct sequences from backbone and fragment sequences.

required_parameters.description: Complete backbone sequence
required_parameters.name: backbone_sequence

required_parameters.description: Type IIS restriction enzyme to be used (e.g., "BsmBI", "BsaI")
required_parameters.name: enzyme_name

required_parameters.description: List of fragments to insert, containing one of: name + fwd_oligo + rev_oligo (oligo pair with matching overhangs) or name + sequence (double-stranded DNA fragment containing restriction sites)
required_parameters.name: fragments

optional_parameters.description: Whether the backbone is circular
optional_parameters.name: is_circular

manifest.name: pcr_simple
manifest.description: Simulate PCR amplification with given primers and sequence.

required_parameters.description: Either a sequence string or path to plasmid file
required_parameters.name: sequence

required_parameters.description: Forward primer sequence (5' to 3')
required_parameters.name: forward_primer

required_parameters.description: Reverse primer sequence (5' to 3')
required_parameters.name: reverse_primer

optional_parameters.description: Whether the sequence is circular
optional_parameters.name: circular

optional_parameters.description: Threshold value to use when threshold_method is manual
optional_parameters.name: manual_threshold

manifest.name: reconstruct_3d_face_from_mri
manifest.description: Generate a 3D model of facial anatomy from MRI scans of the head and neck.

optional_parameters.description: Directory where output files will be saved
optional_parameters.name: output_dir

optional_parameters.description: Identifier for the subject, used in output filenames
optional_parameters.name: subject_id

optional_parameters.description: Threshold value for initial segmentation of facial tissues
optional_parameters.name: threshold_value

manifest.name: simulate_thyroid_hormone_pharmacokinetics
manifest.description: Simulates the transport and binding of thyroid hormones across different tissue compartments using an ODE-based pharmacokinetic model.

required_parameters.description: Dictionary containing model parameters including transport_rates, binding_constants, metabolism_rates, and volumes
required_parameters.name: parameters

required_parameters.description: Dictionary of initial concentrations for all molecular species in each compartment
required_parameters.name: initial_conditions

optional_parameters.description: Start and end time for simulation in hours
optional_parameters.name: time_span

optional_parameters.description: Number of time points to output
optional_parameters.name: time_points

manifest.name: analyze_bacterial_growth_rate
manifest.description: Analyze bacterial growth data and extract growth parameters from OD600 measurements.

required_parameters.description: Time points at which OD600 measurements were taken (in hours)
required_parameters.name: time_points

required_parameters.description: Optical density (OD600) measurements corresponding to each time point
required_parameters.name: od_measurements

optional_parameters.description: Name of the bacterial strain being analyzed
optional_parameters.name: strain_name

optional_parameters.description: Directory where to save the output files
optional_parameters.name: output_dir

manifest.name: analyze_circular_dichroism_spectra
manifest.description: Analyzes circular dichroism (CD) spectroscopy data to determine secondary structure and thermal stability.

required_parameters.description: Name of the biomolecule sample (e.g., "Znf706", "G-quadruplex")
required_parameters.name: sample_name

required_parameters.description: Type of biomolecule ("protein" or "nucleic_acid")
required_parameters.name: sample_type

required_parameters.description: Wavelength values in nm for CD spectrum
required_parameters.name: wavelength_data

required_parameters.description: CD signal intensity values (typically in mdeg or Î”Îµ)
required_parameters.name: cd_signal_data

optional_parameters.description: Temperature values (Â°C) for thermal denaturation experiment
optional_parameters.name: temperature_data

optional_parameters.description: CD signal values at specific wavelength across different temperatures
optional_parameters.name: thermal_cd_data

optional_parameters.description: Directory to save result files
optional_parameters.name: output_dir

manifest.name: analyze_enzyme_kinetics_assay
manifest.description: Performs in vitro enzyme kinetics assay and analyzes the dose-dependent effects of modulators.

required_parameters.description: Name of the purified enzyme being tested
required_parameters.name: enzyme_name

required_parameters.description: List of substrate concentrations in Î¼M for kinetic analysis
required_parameters.name: substrate_concentrations

required_parameters.description: Concentration of the enzyme in nM
required_parameters.name: enzyme_concentration

optional_parameters.description: Dictionary of modulators where keys are modulator names and values are lists of concentrations in Î¼M
optional_parameters.name: modulators

optional_parameters.description: Time points in minutes for time-course measurements
optional_parameters.name: time_points

optional_parameters.description: Directory to save output files
optional_parameters.name: output_dir

manifest.name: analyze_itc_binding_thermodynamics
manifest.description: Analyzes isothermal titration calorimetry (ITC) data to determine binding affinity and thermodynamic parameters.

optional_parameters.description: Path to CSV or TSV file containing ITC thermogram data with columns for injection number, injection volume, and heat released/absorbed.
optional_parameters.name: itc_data_path

optional_parameters.description: Raw ITC thermogram data as a numpy array with shape (n_injections, 3) containing injection number, injection volume, and heat.
optional_parameters.name: itc_data

optional_parameters.description: Temperature in Kelvin at which the experiment was conducted.
optional_parameters.name: temperature

optional_parameters.description: Initial concentration of protein in the cell in molar (M).
optional_parameters.name: protein_concentration

optional_parameters.description: Concentration of ligand in the syringe in molar (M).
optional_parameters.name: ligand_concentration

manifest.name: analyze_protease_kinetics
manifest.description: Analyze protease kinetics data from fluorogenic peptide cleavage assays, fit the data to Michaelis-Menten kinetics, and determine key kinetic parameters.

required_parameters.description: Array of time points (in seconds) at which measurements were taken
required_parameters.name: time_points

required_parameters.description: 2D array of fluorescence measurements where each row corresponds to a different substrate concentration and each column corresponds to a time point
required_parameters.name: fluorescence_data

required_parameters.description: Array of substrate concentrations (in Î¼M) corresponding to each row in fluorescence_data
required_parameters.name: substrate_concentrations

required_parameters.description: Concentration of the protease enzyme (in Î¼M)
required_parameters.name: enzyme_concentration

optional_parameters.description: Prefix for output files
optional_parameters.name: output_prefix

optional_parameters.description: Directory to save output files
optional_parameters.name: output_dir

manifest.name: analyze_protein_conservation
manifest.description: Perform multiple sequence alignment and phylogenetic analysis to identify conserved protein regions.

required_parameters.description: List of protein sequences in FASTA format from multiple organisms.
required_parameters.name: protein_sequences

optional_parameters.description: Directory to save output files
optional_parameters.name: output_dir

manifest.name: analyze_rna_secondary_structure_features
manifest.description: Calculate numeric values for various structural features of an RNA secondary structure.

required_parameters.description: RNA secondary structure in dot-bracket notation (e.g., "(((...)))"). Parentheses represent base pairs, dots represent unpaired bases.
required_parameters.name: dot_bracket_structure

optional_parameters.description: The RNA sequence corresponding to the structure. If provided, sequence-dependent energy calculations will be performed.
optional_parameters.name: sequence

manifest.description: Analyze calcium imaging data to quantify neuronal activity metrics including cell counts, event rates, decay times, and signal-to-noise ratios.

required_parameters.name: image_stack_path

optional_parameters.description: Directory to save output files
optional_parameters.name: output_dir

required_parameters.name: image_sequence_path

optional_parameters.description: Conversion factor from pixels to micrometers
optional_parameters.name: pixel_size_um

optional_parameters.description: Time interval between consecutive frames in minutes
optional_parameters.name: time_interval_min

optional_parameters.description: Minimum number of frames a cell must be tracked to be included in analysis
optional_parameters.name: min_track_length

optional_parameters.description: Directory to save output files
optional_parameters.name: output_dir

required_parameters.name: time_points

required_parameters.description: Measured drug concentration at each time point
required_parameters.name: concentration_data

optional_parameters.name: total_drug_loaded

optional_parameters.description: Directory to save output files
optional_parameters.name: output_dir

required_parameters.name: image_path

optional_parameters.name: nuclei_channel

optional_parameters.name: myofiber_channel

optional_parameters.name: threshold_method

optional_parameters.description: Directory to save output files
optional_parameters.name: output_dir

manifest.name: decode_behavior_from_neural_trajectories

optional_parameters.name: n_components

optional_parameters.description: Directory to save output files

manifest.name: perform_crispr_cas9_genome_editing
manifest.description: Simulates CRISPR-Cas9 genome editing process including guide RNA design, delivery, and analysis.

required_parameters.name: guide_rna_sequences

required_parameters.description: Target genomic sequence to be edited (should be longer than guide RNA and contain the target sites)
required_parameters.name: target_genomic_loci

required_parameters.description: Type of cell or tissue being edited (affects delivery efficiency and editing outcomes)
required_parameters.name: cell_tissue_type

manifest.name: simulate_whole_cell_ode_model
manifest.description: Simulate a whole-cell model represented as a system of ordinary differential equations (ODEs).

required_parameters.description: Initial values for each state variable in the model. If dict, keys are variable names and values are initial concentrations/values. If array-like, order must match the order expected by the ODE function.
required_parameters.name: initial_conditions

required_parameters.description: Model parameters required by the ODE function. Keys are parameter names and values are parameter values.
required_parameters.name: parameters

optional_parameters.description: Function defining the system of ODEs. Should take arguments (t, y, *args) where t is time, y is the state vector, and args contains additional parameters. If None, a simple example whole-cell model will be used.
optional_parameters.name: ode_function

optional_parameters.description: Tuple of (start_time, end_time) for the simulation.
optional_parameters.name: time_span

optional_parameters.description: Number of time points to evaluate.
optional_parameters.name: time_points

optional_parameters.description: Numerical integration method to use (e.g., 'RK45', 'LSODA', 'BDF').
optional_parameters.name: method

manifest.name: analyze_tissue_deformation_flow
manifest.description: Quantify tissue deformation and flow dynamics from microscopy image sequence.

required_parameters.description: Sequence of microscopy images (either a list of file paths or a 3D numpy array [time, height, width])
required_parameters.name: image_sequence

optional_parameters.description: Directory to save results
optional_parameters.name: output_dir

optional_parameters.description: Physical scale of pixels (e.g., Î¼m/pixel) for proper scaling of metrics
optional_parameters.name: pixel_scale

manifest.name: predict_protein_disorder_regions

required_parameters.name: fcs_file_path

manifest.name: analyze_copy_number_purity_ploidy_and_focal_events

required_parameters.name: tumor_bam

required_parameters.name: reference_genome
required_parameters.description: Path to reference genome FASTA

optional_parameters.name: normal_bam

optional_parameters.name: output_dir

optional_parameters.name: targets_bed

optional_parameters.name: antitargets_bed

optional_parameters.name: gene_bed

optional_parameters.name: log2_amp_threshold
optional_parameters.description: Log2 ratio threshold for focal amplification calls

optional_parameters.name: log2_del_threshold
optional_parameters.description: Log2 ratio threshold for focal deep deletion calls

optional_parameters.description: SnpEff database to use for annotation

required_parameters.description: Directory where results will be saved

optional_parameters.description: Path to the COSMIC database for cancer annotation
optional_parameters.name: cosmic_db_path

optional_parameters.description: Path to the ClinVar database for clinical annotation
optional_parameters.name: clinvar_db_path

optional_parameters.name: endpoint

optional_parameters.description: Anthropic API key. If None, will use ANTHROPIC_API_KEY env variable
optional_parameters.name: api_key

optional_parameters.description: Anthropic model to use
optional_parameters.name: model

optional_parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return per page
optional_parameters.name: max_results

manifest.name: query_iucn
manifest.description: Query the IUCN Red List API using natural language or a direct endpoint.

required_parameters.description: IUCN API token - required for all queries
required_parameters.name: token

optional_parameters.description: Natural language query about species conservation status
optional_parameters.name: prompt

optional_parameters.description: API endpoint name (e.g., "species/id/12392") or full URL
optional_parameters.name: endpoint

optional_parameters.description: Anthropic API key. If None, will use ANTHROPIC_API_KEY env variable
optional_parameters.name: api_key

optional_parameters.description: Anthropic model to use for natural language processing
optional_parameters.name: model

optional_parameters.description: Whether to return detailed query information or just formatted results
optional_parameters.name: verbose

manifest.name: query_jaspar
manifest.description: Query the JASPAR REST API using natural language or a direct endpoint to retrieve transcription factor binding profiles.

required_parameters.description: Natural language query about transcription factor binding profiles
required_parameters.name: prompt

optional_parameters.description: API endpoint path (e.g., '/matrix/MA0002.2/') or full URL
optional_parameters.name: endpoint

optional_parameters.description: Anthropic API key. If None, will use ANTHROPIC_API_KEY env variable
optional_parameters.name: api_key

optional_parameters.description: Anthropic model to use for natural language processing
optional_parameters.name: model

optional_parameters.description: Whether to return detailed query information
optional_parameters.name: verbose

manifest.name: query_kegg
manifest.description: Take a natural language prompt and convert it to a structured KEGG API query.

required_parameters.description: Natural language query about KEGG data (e.g., "Find human pathways related to glycolysis")
required_parameters.name: prompt

optional_parameters.description: Direct KEGG API endpoint to query
optional_parameters.name: endpoint

optional_parameters.description: Anthropic API key. If None, will look for ANTHROPIC_API_KEY environment variable
optional_parameters.name: api_key

optional_parameters.description: Anthropic model to use
optional_parameters.name: model

optional_parameters.description: Whether to return detailed API response information
optional_parameters.name: verbose
